Q4

PEAK PERFORMANCE. IN ANY SITUATION. Outmatched by no one.
Walther continues their tradition of superiority with a handgun designed specifically for those who only buy the best and nothing less.
This is the ultimate representation of high-class performance in an optic ready compact size package that just can’t be found anywhere else.
A feat in firearm engineering that simply must be felt to be believed, the Q4 Steel Frame will surpass all expectations with its unrivaled accuracy and proficiency.
Its steel frame – precision machined from solid steel billet – improves ergonomics with a wrap-around grip panel, extended beavertail, full length picatinny rail and recessed slide release.
The weight distribution of the steel frame drastically reduces recoil to improve shooter performance, ultimately contributing to overall efficiency.
A testament to Walther’s enduring legacy of excellence, the Q4 Steel Frame delivers peak performance when you need it most.
Featuring Walther’s legendary barrel, serrated LPA sights as well as front and rear serrations, plus the option for optics for when the situation demands it.
The advantages this handgun delivers are undeniable.
The Q4 Steel Frame from Walther is an accomplishment that encompasses everything shooters desire in a premier firearm for dynamic shooting capable of outlasting even the toughest conditions.

Technical Data   PPQ Q4 SF
Date of manufacture   2019 to
Caliber   9mm Parabellum
System   pre-cocked Quick Defense Trigger striker, recoil-operated
Locking Mechanism   Modified Browning tilting barrel
Safety   3 automatic safeties
Weight, Empty   1125 grams
Length   7.40" (188mm)
Height   5.39" (137mm)
Width   1.4" (36mm)
Barrel Length   4.0" (102mm)
Rifling   6 grooves polygonal
Twist   Right hand
Magazine Capacity   15 Cartridges depending on magazine.
Material   Steel slide and frame
Finish   Black
Grip    Black polymer 
Accessories   Includes 2 Magazines, Plastic Case, Cleaning Rod, Instructions and 1 Year Warranty
